raw_output.result:
Found 5 search results:

1. Central Banks Gold Reserves by Country | World Gold Council
   URL: https://www.gold.org/goldhub/data/gold-reserves-by-country
   Summary: Find out how muchgoldcentral banks hold and how it compares to their foreignreserves. Explore the data by country, date, category and value using the Goldhub dashboard.

2. India Gold Reserves - TRADING ECONOMICS
   URL: https://tradingeconomics.com/india/gold-reserves
   Summary: GoldReservesinIndiaincreased to 880.18 Tonnes in the third quarter of 2025 from 880 Tonnes in the second quarter of 2025. This page provides -IndiaGoldReserves- actual values, historical data, forecast, chart, statistics, economic calendar and news.

3. India Gold Reserves, 1956 - 2025 | CEIC Data
   URL: https://www.ceicdata.com/en/indicator/india/gold-reserves
   Summary: See the historical and current data ofIndia'sgoldreservesin USD billion, updated monthly by CEIC Data. CompareIndia'sgoldreserveswith other countries and regions using the chart and table.

4. 880 tonnes and counting: Why RBI keeps buying gold despite India having ...
   URL: https://economictimes.indiatimes.com/news/new-updates/880-tonnes-and-counting-why-rbi-keeps-buying-gold-despite-indias-7th-largest-reserves/articleshow/120762409.cms
   Summary: Amid global economic uncertainties, central banks are increasinggoldreservesfor stability. TheReserveBank ofIndiasignificantly boosted itsgoldholdings, purchasing 57.5 tonnes in FY24-25 and repatriating 214 tonnes since 2022. This strategic move aims to hedge against dollar volatility and strengthenIndia'sforeign exchange base, supporting the rupee's global role.

5. India's Gold Reserves (2000-2025): A Strategic Shift in National Wealth
   URL: https://cms.indiagraphs.com/data-stories/indias-gold-reserves-2000-2025-a-strategic-shift-in-national-wealth/
   Summary: DiscoverIndia'sgoldreservesgrowth from 2000 to 2025. Year-wise data, government impact, and RBI-backed facts visualized by Indiagraphs.
